page.title: 16 Our Harvest Festival
page.content: Each year at our school we have a {harvest festival.}It is one of the main{events}of the school year. This year we have been collecting {food}for the old people who live in Mistley. As well as this we are collecting lentils, sugar, wholemeal flour and dried peas for the people of Africa where there is a very bad famine. At the harvest festival we sing hymns and songs to celebrate the harvest of our food for the long Winter. We say prayers thanking God for our food. After the harvest festival some of the older children delivered the food to the old people.
